Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor to continuously track the health and performance of Azure Elastic SAN. Identify and address any anomalies or potential issues.
Verify the security settings of Azure Elastic SAN, including encryption at rest and access controls. Ensure compliance with organizational security policies.
Test backup and restore processes to ensure data integrity and availability in case of failures or disasters.
Conduct regular audits of Azure Elastic SAN configurations to ensure alignment with best practices and organizational requirements.
Analyze storage usage trends and plan for capacity upgrades or optimizations to meet future demands.
Review and update security policies for Azure Elastic SAN to adapt to changes in the threat landscape or organizational requirements.
Perform failover tests to verify the resiliency of Azure Elastic SAN and ensure that redundant paths function correctly during outages.
Analyze performance metrics and implement optimizations to ensure Azure Elastic SAN operates within expected parameters.
Keep documentation for Azure Elastic SAN up-to-date, including operational procedures, configuration details, and troubleshooting guides.
Evaluate Azure Elastic SAN's performance against the SLA. Address any deviations or issues with Microsoft support.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for potential security incidents or storage outages. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new Azure Elastic SAN features, best practices, and security measures.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding Azure Elastic SAN performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
